properties.name: google-indexation.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable the Google Indexation client.

properties.name: google-indexation.service-account-json
properties.description: Raw service account JSON used to authenticate with the Google Indexing API.

properties.name: google-indexation.service-account-path
properties.description: Filesystem path to the service account JSON used to authenticate with the Google Indexing API.

properties.name: google-indexation.request-timeout
properties.description: Timeout applied to Indexing API requests.

properties.name: google-indexation.batch-size
properties.description: Default batch size used when publishing multiple URLs.
